page.title: 07Children's Games
page.content: {At my school we usually have ten people playing blocky.Someone is it and has to count to one hundred then the rest have to hide.Then the counter has to look for them.If the counter is away from the blocky post one of the hiders can run out of his hiding place and touch the post and shout out blocky 1,2,3,and their name. We also play hopscotch in the school yard.A line of boxes numbered one to ten is painted on the ground. To play we have to throw a stone on each number in turn.We have to jump into the boxes, one foot in each box, and pick the stone up on the way.If you step on a line you are out.Any number can play this game.
